text:
Just got off the Eurostar in Paris, and it's as cold here as it is in Newbury, with snow on the ground!
But we've picked up cheese and wine from the Monoprix and are heading up to the steps of the Sacre Coeur for a wintry picnic.
à bientôt mes amis! x

Bonjour! We got the TGV down to Avignon, early enough to catch the flea market. We had moules and frites with a fantastic view of the Pont Saint-Benezet, and later we're getting the petite train to see the sights. Love you xx

Greetings from Lake Lucerne! We took the overnight train, woke up among the snowy mountains. We're going to try to get to the peak at 2,128m of Mount Pilatus. Probably take the cable car! Trip to the glacier garden later to see potholes formed during the last ice-age! xx

Last day of carnivale! Venice is as stunning as ever. Our favourite pizza place is still there and the karaoke is just a raucous as we remembered. If you don't know the words, you have to clap. It's easy to find, it's near a square, past a bridge over a canal! Hope to drink in some of the carnival atmosphere this evening. xxx
